q: why do they have to wash it
pred: The person in the video is washing the potatoes in the sink. They are using a sponge to scrub the potatoes and then rinsing them under the faucet. This process is essential for cleaning the potatoes thoroughly and removing any dirt, bacteria, or pesticides that might be present on their surface. Washing the potatoes before cooking ensures that they are safe to eat and prevents any potential health risks associated with consuming contaminated food.
